products.title: tshirt
products.description:
Aotearoa T-Shirt by Hallenstein Brothers

    Represent New Zealand in our Aotearoa tee feautring the outline of New Zealand and Aotearoa graphic. The perfect tee for those lazy summer days.
  • Crew neck
  • New Zealand outline to the front
  • Aotearoa graphic to the front
  • Regular fit
  • Ribbed neck
  • Soft cotton
  • 160GSM cotton
  • Model wears size M/32 | 185cm/6'1 tall

Product code: 9548505

products.title: Gold Sovereeign Rings
products.description: (Reserved for Pit Members Only) Custom branded sovereign and half sovereign signet rings for Strength Pit Otara.

products.title: Sterling Silver RINGS
products.description:
A truly special piece with jewellery and fragrance combined, we introduce you - Scented Jewellery. An inspiring and unique gift or a piece to own for yourself, this innovative accessory offers you both perfume and jewellery in one product - a true girl’s best friend!

Each scented jewellery comes with a 3 month supply of scented stone that slowly diffuse the fragrance of your choice and allows the perfume to slowly release into the air around you. A new and clever way of wearing your perfume!
